post.title: firmware/update requests for onkyo/integra-please read
post.content: if you are looking for an onkyo/integra dsp update or main firmware please visit gurkey's direct firmware thread which i have a link to. he has all of the latest available to you on his first page. thanks. http://www.avsforum.com/avs-vb/showthread.php?t=1016297
